scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:backend: docker compose exec backend pytest tests/ -v --cov=app
scripts.test:frontend: docker compose exec frontend npm test -- --watchAll=false
scripts.test:unit: docker compose exec backend pytest tests/unit/ -v && docker compose exec frontend npm test -- --testPathPattern=unit --watchAll=false
scripts.lint: docker compose exec backend flake8 app/ && docker compose exec frontend npm run lint
scripts.format: docker compose exec backend black app/ && docker compose exec frontend npm run format
scripts.docs:build: docker compose exec backend mkdocs build
scripts.docs:serve: docker compose exec backend mkdocs serve
scripts.clean: docker compose down -v && docker system prune -f
